Comments
========

Different types of comments

.. This is a comment

..
   _so: is this!

..
   [and] this!

..
   this:: too!

..
   |even| this:: !

.. |or this\| foo:: !

.. |and even this is a comment.

..
  - difference in case sensitivity
  - difference in allowed field length
  - difference in what you can compare (e.g TRUE =! 0)

End of comments.
